SEARCH
Package org.model

Class BoardModel

java.lang.Object
org.model.BoardModel
public class BoardModel extends Object
The BoardModel class represents the game board and the pieces in the game. It stores information about the board layout, the pieces' positions, and the groups of pieces that form mills.

  • Nested Class Summary

    static enum 
    BoardModel.Color
    Enum representing the color states of a game piece.

      public boolean isFieldEmpty(int field)
      Checks if a field is empty.
      Parameters:
      field - The index of the field to check.
      Returns:
      true if the field is empty, false otherwise.

    • isFieldOfColor

      public boolean isFieldOfColor(int field, BoardModel.Color color)
      Checks if a field contains a piece of the specified color.
      Parameters:
      field - The index of the field to check.
      color - The color to check for.
      Returns:
      true if the field contains a piece of the specified color, false otherwise.

    • isFieldInMill

      public boolean isFieldInMill(int field)
      Checks if a field is part of a mill.

    • areNeighbors

      public boolean areNeighbors(int a, int b)
      Checks if two fields are neighbors.
      Parameters:
      a - The index of the first field.
      b - The index of the second field.
      Returns:
      true if the fields are neighbors, false otherwise.

    • movePiece

      public boolean movePiece(int from, int to) throws RuntimeException
      Moves a piece from one field to another.
      Parameters:
      from - The index of the field where the piece is moving from.
      to - The index of the field where the piece is moving to.
      Returns:
      true if the move results in a mill, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If the move is not valid (note: this is not possible if the game is played without any modifications)

    • putPiece

      public boolean putPiece(int where, BoardModel.Color color) throws RuntimeException
      Places a piece on the specified field. Pass Color.EMPTY to remove a piece from the field.
      Parameters:
      where - The index of the field where the piece is to be placed.
      color - The color of the piece to be placed.
      Returns:
      true if placing the piece results in a mill, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If the field is already occupied and the color is not Color.EMPTY.

    • getFields

      public List<Integer> getFields(BoardModel.Color byColor, boolean byMill)
      Gets a list of fields that contain pieces of the specified color and status (whether they are part of a mill or not).
      Parameters:
      byColor - The color of the pieces to check.
      byMill - true to filter for pieces that are in a mill, false for those not in a mill.
      Returns:
      A list of field indices with the specified color and mill status.

    • getFields

      public List<Integer> getFields(BoardModel.Color byColor)
      Gets a list of fields that contain pieces of the specified color.
      Parameters:
      byColor - The color of the pieces to check.
      Returns:
      A list of field indices with the specified color.

    • getNumberOfFields

      public int getNumberOfFields()
      Gets the total number of fields on the board.
      Returns:
      The number of fields.

    • getMovableFields

      public List<Integer> getMovableFields(BoardModel.Color byColor)
      Gets a list of fields that contain pieces of the specified color and have at least one neighboring empty field.
      Parameters:
      byColor - The color of the pieces to check.
      Returns:
      A list of field indices with the specified color that can be moved.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If byColor is Color.EMPTY.

    • filterFieldsByColor

      public List<Integer> filterFieldsByColor(@NotNull List<Integer> fieldsToSort, BoardModel.Color byColor)
      Filters a list of fields based on the color of the pieces at those fields.
      Parameters:
      fieldsToSort - The list of fields to be filtered.
      byColor - The color to filter by.
      Returns:
      A list of field indices that contain pieces of the specified color.

    • getPossibleMoves

      public List<Integer> getPossibleMoves(int from, boolean flying)
      Gets a list of possible moves for a piece at a given field.
      Parameters:
      from - The index of the field where the piece is located.
      flying - true if the piece can fly to any empty field, false if it can only move to neighboring empty fields.
      Returns:
      A list of field indices where the piece can move.

    • getNeighbouring

      public List<Integer> getNeighbouring(Integer i)
      Gets the neighboring fields for a given field.
      Parameters:
      i - The field index.
      Returns:
      A list of neighboring fields.

    • getNeighbouring

      public List<Integer> getNeighbouring(List<Integer> list)
      Gets the neighboring fields for a list of fields.
      Parameters:
      list - A list of field indices.
      Returns:
      A list of neighboring fields for all the given fields.

    • getFieldColor

      public BoardModel.Color getFieldColor(int i)
      Gets the color of the piece at the specified field.
      Parameters:
